data.caption: Limited Review Report Issued By The Statutory Auditors On The Standalone Financial Results For The Quarter And Half Year Ended September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
Further to our letter dated November 13, 2021, submitting Outcome of the Board Meeting held on November 13, 2021, pursuant to Regulations 30, 33 and 52 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 ('Listing Regulations') read with Schedule III to the Listing Regulations, we enclose herewith signed Limited Review Report on the Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2021.

The signature of the Statutory Auditor was not visible / to be seen in the file due to some technical glitches.

We request you to take the above on your record.
